name: Pathways (PathwaysTeam)
description:
This prototype game was concepted and created in 7 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

Ever since the discovery of portal technology transportation across the universe has become a breeze.  At least, until things get in the way.  Train tracks connect this new world, but things keep appearing on the tracks making it not safe to travel.  It’s your job to travel up the track, and clear the way using the drones provided for you on your Pathways Tourism Specialists LLC patented Track Clearance Shuttle.

Credits:
Michael Schwedler - Lead Designer
Eric Lin - 3D Modeler
Phodchara Phumala - 2D & UI Artist
